sermons.title: He Will Not Break A Bruised Reed
sermons.description: April 24, 2005. When we are bruised and wounded by hurt , pain and unfulfilled expectations God will bring us to a breaking point. At this breaking point the word of God will come to try us. The devil will also come to try to destroy your faith in GodÂ’s promises. At this breaking point God will come with at with still small voice and He will speak a message of mercy and offer His guidance in compassionate love. You will hear a small whisper saying I love you donÂ’t give up.
